== Available dumps ==

Currently, there are two dumps hosted on odylab-evedb:
  * Dominion 1.0.0: http://dom100.latest.odylab-evedb.appspot.com
  * Tyrannis 1.0.1: http://tyr101.latest.odylab-evedb.appspot.com

You can specify exact dump with URLs above, if none is specified then the latest dump will be used.
